mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tweets (user_id, content, in_reply_to_tweet_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{inReplyToTweetId})
INSERT INTO tweet_media (tweet_id, media_id, position) VALUES (#{tweetId}, #{mediaId}, #{position})

INSERT INTO media (media_type, mime_type, bytes, width, height, duration_ms, sha256, blurhash, storage_key) VALUES (#{mediaType}, #{mimeType}, #{bytes}, #{width}, #{height}, #{durationMs}, #{sha256}, #{blurhash}, #{storageKey})
